dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To extend foreclosure and eviction protections for servicemembers, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Servicemembers Foreclosure Protection Act of 2014.

section.header: Extension of protections for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction

subsection.text: Paragraph (1) of section 710(d) of the Honoring America’s Veterans and Caring for Camp Lejeune Families Act of 2012 (Public Law 112–154; 126 Stat. 1208) is amended by striking 2014 and inserting 2016.
Section 710(d) of the Honoring America’s Veterans and Caring for Camp Lejeune Families Act of 2012 (Public Law 112–154; 126 Stat. 1208) is amended by striking paragraph (3).
